xwikidoc.content: <kushalk124> has quit 02:05 <kushalk124> has joined #phenotips 02:05 <kushalk124> is now known as <Guest43414> 02:09 <Guest43414> is now known as <kushalkhandelwal> 02:21 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 03:17 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 03:17 <kushalkhandelwal> is now known as <Guest75413> 03:38 <Guest75413> has quit 03:51 <Guest75413> has joined #phenotips 05:53 <Guest75413> has quit 08:14 <sdumitriu> has quit 08:16 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 10:47 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 12:11 <Guest75413> has joined #phenotips 12:11 <Guest75413> is now known as <kushalkhandelwal> 12:23 <sdumitriu1> Hey kushalkhandelwal 12:43 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey sdumitriu1 12:43 <kushalkhandelwal> Good morning 12:51 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 12:54 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 12:54 <kushalkhandelwal> is now known as <Guest11228> 12:55 <Guest11228> is now known as <Kushalk124> 13:23 <sdumitriu1> Kushalk124: How's the issue going? 13:23 <Kushalk124> sdumitriu, Working on it 13:24 <Kushalk124> Trying to find time , had a busy day 13:24 <Kushalk124> And fixing up things on my computer 13:24 <Kushalk124> :P 13:24 <Kushalk124> You say 13:24 <Kushalk124> Fixing minor bugs ? 13:24 <sdumitriu1> No, preparing bigger changes 13:24 <Kushalk124> Oh 13:24 <Kushalk124> Some major changes ? 13:25 <Kushalk124> Deadline for next milestone ? 13:25 <sdumitriu1> Tomorrow 13:25 <Kushalk124> :O 13:25 <Kushalk124> Ohh 13:25 <sdumitriu1> I have to finish some things 13:25 <Kushalk124> I will finish this bug tonight then 13:25 <sdumitriu1> (not a release, though) 13:25 <sdumitriu1> You don't have to 13:26 <sdumitriu1> The release should happen next Friday, 24 13:26 <Kushalk124> I will :) 13:26 <Kushalk124> A lot of time for that 13:26 <Kushalk124> So you working on some new feature ? 13:27 <sdumitriu1> Yep 13:28 <Kushalk124> When you get time tell me more about CNV and the work at lab :) 15:01 <Kushalk124> Do I have to add 15:01 <Kushalk124> extended_ * item also ? 15:02 <Kushalk124> sdumitriu1, ? 15:50 <sdumitriu1> Back 15:51 <sdumitriu1> extended no 15:51 <Kushalk124> Come on ccm 15:51 <Kushalk124> Oh ok :) 15:51 <Kushalk124> Done with it 15:51 <Kushalk124> not able to push 15:51 <Kushalk124> some setting issue mostly 15:51 <Kushalk124> like old time 15:51 <Kushalk124> trying to figure that out 15:51 <Kushalk124> then would push 17:39 <sdumitriu1> has quit 17:39 <BogdanVancea> has quit 19:20 <BogdanVancea> has quit 22:13 <Kushalk124> Hey sdumitriu 22:14 <sdumitriu> Hey 22:14 <Kushalk124> Good morning 22:15 <Kushalk124> How are you ? 22:15 <sdumitriu> Sleepy 22:15 <Kushalk124> Ahh 22:15 <Kushalk124> Sleep 22:15 <Kushalk124> its late 22:15 <Kushalk124> Working ? 22:15 <Kushalk124> Just tell me one thing is there a way to live edit ? 22:16 <Kushalk124> Can I write JS withing the XWiki edit mode ? 22:16 <sdumitriu> Trying to finish some code 22:16 <sdumitriu> Yes 22:16 <sdumitriu> http://localhost:8080/bin/edit/ClinicalInformationCode/PatientSheetCode?editor=object 22:16 <Kushalk124> Within the same edit mode I write my JS ? 22:17 <Kushalk124> From here ? 22:17 <Kushalk124> How ? 22:18 <sdumitriu> Or maybe I don't understand your question 22:18 <sdumitriu> There are different objects there 22:18 <sdumitriu> Some with JS code, some with CSS 22:19 <sdumitriu> You can change existing code, save, and refresh a patient's record to have the new code 22:19 <sdumitriu> Or you can add a new object and write your own JS 22:19 <Kushalk124> Over here I dont see the option to edit 22:20 <Kushalk124> http://localhost:8080/bin/edit/PhenoTips/PatientSheetCode I can't write the new code here ? 22:20 <sdumitriu> No 22:20 <sdumitriu> Edit what? 22:20 <sdumitriu> What can't you edit? 22:20 <sdumitriu> You're already in edit mode 22:20 <sdumitriu> Just type 22:21 <sdumitriu> Ah, wait 22:21 <sdumitriu> Wrong URL 22:21 <sdumitriu> http://localhost:8080/bin/edit/PhenoTips/PatientSheetCode?editor=object 22:23 <Kushalk124> Ok 22:23 <Kushalk124> So here I can create a new object and write my new JS
